# AI Response Example

Here's a comprehensive example of markdown content:

## Code Example

```typescript
interface User {
  id: string;
  name: string;
  email: string;
}

function getUser(id: string): User {
  return { id, name: "John", email: "john@example.com" };
}
```

## Math Formula

The quadratic formula is:

$$
x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}
$$
